title: 3rd age equipment

properties.name: description
properties.value: 3rd age equipment are a group of members items obtained by completing the highest tiers of Treasure Trails (hard and above). There are four combat sets, plus an axe, a pickaxe, a ring and a cloak.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:3rd age equipment

3rd age equipment are a group of members items obtained by completing the highest tiers of Treasure Trails (hard and above). There are four combat sets, plus an axe, a pickaxe, a ring and a cloak.

Lore-wise, they resemble what people used to wear for combat during the 3rd age of Gielinor.

Contents

    • 1.1 3rd age melee equipment
    • 1.2 3rd age mage equipment
    • 1.3 3rd age range equipment
    • 1.4 3rd age druidic robes
    • 1.5 Other items
